full_description:
MSI MAG CH120 I Steel Base Gaming Chair Black

The New MSI MAG CH120 I Gaming Chair comes with some special features that can your gaming experience more comfortable and smooth. The backrest of the MAG CH120 I gaming chair can reach a maximum of 180 degree of inclination, making it the perfect gaming chair for the most intense gaming sessions or the most laid back relaxations. 

STEEL FRAME WITH MOLDED FOAM

The MAG CH120 I gaming chair has painted steel that can prevent rust in the long run. For unrivaled comfort, the MAG CH120 I used high-density foam in the seat to provide the most comfortable seating for long lasting gaming sessions.

4D ADJUSTABLE ARMREST

MAG CH120 I has 4D adjustable armrests that can be altered for the most comfortable position for players' forearms.

ERGONOMIC HEADREST AND LUMBAR CUSHION

The headrest pillow and lumbar support cushion provide gamers an ergonomic sitting experience by reducing the pressure in neck and lumbar areas.

CLASS 4 GAS LIFT PISTONS

The MAG CH120 I gaming chair is equipped with a certified class 4 gas lift piston, which has been approved by impartial third-party certification to ensure the highest standard of safety.

LOCKING CASTER WHEELS

The MAG CH120 I gaming chair has locking caster wheels that ensure that the chair wouldn't slide away from battle when you need it most.

5 STAR STEEL BASE

The MAG CH120 I gaming chair sports a chair base constructed of steel that is both sturdy and long-lasting. Its strength is 20% higher than that of the base of traditional chairs, allowing it to stay unbent while supporting players during the many battles and victories to come.

values.value: HEADREST & LUMBAR CUSHION COVER MATERIAL : PVC Leather
SEATING SIZE (W X D ): 52 x 52.5 cm

full_description:
MSI MAG CH120 Steel Frame Gaming Chair

MSI MAG CH120 Steel Frame Gaming Chair featured with Complete steel frame support, 180° fully reclinable backrest, 4D Multi-Adjustable Armrests, and seat, Certified Class 4 Gas Lift piston, and 5-star steel chair base design - so you can use the functions of the chair confidently., Incredibly smooth and silent PU casters, Ergonomic headrest pillow, and lumbar support cushion. The latest MAG CH120 gaming chair offers an original fortified Steel chair base, with a strength of 20% higher than generic bases, it can stay unbent while supporting users for years of usage. The silent PU casters have the look of the racing car's wheel. They are edgy, quiet, and impeccably smooth, providing the mobility you need for every action. In this gaming chair, the headrest pillow and lumbar support cushion that come with the package, provides gamers an ergonomic sitting experience by reducing the pressure on the neck and lumbar. This MSI MAG CH120 Steel Frame Gaming Chair has no warranty

Piston Lift Height Adjustment

The gaming chair is equipped with a certified class 4 gas lift piston, which has been approved by American ANS/BIFMAX5.1 quality assurance and German TUVDIN4550 test to ensure absolute safety. MSI MAG CH120 Gaming Chair is made of painted steel which prevents rust in long use, for great support also here used high-density foam in the seat, you can get a comfortable support feeling when you sitting on it.

180°Recline

This gaming chair reaches a maximum 180 degrees of inclination, making it ideal for lying down, and also it adopts the 4D adjustable armrests and seat, allowing gamers to adjust it to the best position for gaming.

4D Adjustable Arm Rest

The MSI CH120 gaming chair can be adjusted in four different ways. You can slide them shift them left or right, adjust their height, backward or forwards as well as angle them left or right.

Head & Lumbar Pillows

This new MSI MAG CH120 Steel Frame Gaming Chair comes with an ergonomic headrest pillow and lumbar support cushion. For additional comfort, the MSI CH120 gaming chair comes with head and lumbar pillows to fit your preferred sitting position.
